data.description: Beautifully remodeled ranch just hit the market in Waterford! This sprawling home features 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, many detailed updates, and 1,697 sq ft of living space. Walk in the front door to high ceilings, adorned with coffered ceiling moulding and natural light. The living room features a charming gas fireplace, wood floors, and accent stone wall. Open concept kitchen features gorgeous granite countertops, custom cabinets, and stainless steel appliances. Primary bedroom detailed with coffered ceiling moulding and recessed lighting. Primary bathroom with dual sinks, shower, and a jetted tub. Enjoy the spacious family room with a wet bar and wine fridge. Laundry room with sink & extra storage space. Walk out your door-wall to the beautiful back patio with built-in fire pit, gas line hook up for the grill, and fenced private backyard. 2 car attached garage. You don't want to miss this - schedule your showing today!
